title: Dario's Voice Pack
description: This voice pack includes over 600 recordings of different words/phrases and reactions  for a single character idealy a male wizard or warrior.
longDescription:
This voice pack includes over 600 recordings of different words/phrases and reactions (list below) for a single character idealy a male wizard or warrior in a first or third person adventure/fantasy/RPG game.


Featuring Darren Bowyer-Warner, professional voice actor.


Please check our promo video ! :

https://youtu.be/xtw7T14WeMA


Categories :

Attack x31

Being Burnt x 15

Being Hurt x 32 (Badly/Hard/Soft)

Breath x 6

Brethless/Gasping x12

Celebration x11

(Hourrah/Wouh/Yeah/Yes)

Chewing/Gargle x9

Clear Throat/Swallow x19

Climbing x13

Coughing x 17

Dying x23

(Long/Medium/Short)

Giggle x10

Zombie x 52 (Attack/Breath/Gnarling/Moaning/MouthNoises/Seeking/Struggling)


Tags: Fantasy, Magic, Adventure, Wizards, Spells, Quests, RPG, Medieval, Epic, Battle, Heroes, Enchantment, Sorcery, Sound Effect, Voice Over, Male, video game


Need custom made sounds? graftone@gmx.com


This voice pack will be subject to upgrades in the future. Please comment for additional content and/or check regularly.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 642

Number of cues: 642

Sample rate / bit rate: 48,000 Hz / 24-bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 12:00+

additional : Mono
